caption.title: Study area and predicted habitat suitability for Emys trinacris.
caption.p: Study area and presence records of the target species, Emys trinacris ( Fritz et al., 2005); (A) the Protected Areasâ€™ network (both nationally- and internationally-established) of study area is highlighted in blue. (B) Map of habitat suitability, discretized in 10 classes, obtained from the Ensemble Modelling process performed over Emys trinacris presence and pseudo-absences records.
